column2: I could go on and on about this place. But a couple of other things I wanted to point out- it currently houses the famous "A Sunday Afternoon on the Island of La Grande Jatte" painting by Georges Seurat
column3: and it's something you have to look at from far away to appreciate the whole picture
column4: then up close to appreciate and be awestruck by the finer details that went into making the whole thing.
